name: YLLW FACTORY
description: Sweden's leading B2B furniture reuse specialist with 65,000+ items in inventory and comprehensive refurbishment services. Operates a dedicated refurbishment factory in Dalby with hospitality market expertise including hotels and restaurants. Provides full-service solutions from sourcing to installation with 3-year warranties.
location: Primary warehouse and refurbishment factory in Dalby, Skåne. Secondary warehouse in Jönköping. Sales office in Stockholm. Nationwide coverage across Sweden.
services: Fire safety testing coordination via RISE/SP

capabilities.volume: 65,000+ items in inventory with capacity for multiple simultaneous large hotel projects. Historically accumulated 30,000 chairs, demonstrating exceptional volume capability. Can handle 100-200 room hotel renovations.
capabilities.leadTime: Stock items: 1-3 weeks. Custom sourcing projects: 6-12 weeks. Refurbishment services add 3-6 weeks. Volume orders: 4-8 weeks for accumulation and quality control.
capabilities.inventory: Largest B2B furniture inventory in Sweden. Strong focus on office chairs, desks, storage, sofas, lounge furniture. Restaurant and café furniture available. Critical gap: hotel bed frames not currently stocked.
capabilities.logistics: Nationwide Swedish delivery. Stockholm sales office provides rapid metropolitan coverage. Full installation services with professional project management. Nordic coverage possible but requires verification.

certifications: Kammarkollegiet framework supplier status
RISE and SP testing lab partnerships for fire safety
Contract-grade textile fire ratings (EN 1021)
Full sustainability reporting capability
CO2 quantification for projects

hospitalityReadiness.score: Highest - Premium hospitality specialist with proven hotel experience
strengths: Documented hospitality segment focus (Hotell & Restaurang)
Proven hotel projects: Nobis Hotels, Wihlborgs premium properties
Largest inventory (65,000+ items) enables volume hotel projects
In-house refurbishment factory ensures quality control
3-year warranty provides client confidence
Fire safety capability with RISE/SP testing coordination
Full-service model: sourcing, refurbishment, logistics, installation
Stockholm presence for rapid metropolitan delivery
Framework supplier credentials demonstrate enterprise capability
Sustainability reporting matches hotel ESG requirements
gaps: Hotel bed frames not currently stocked (critical 25-30% of room budget)
Material passports not systematically provided
Hospitality segment not exclusively focused (competes with office furniture)
Textile refurbishment uses new fire-rated fabrics (not reused textiles)
Website doesn't prominently showcase hotel portfolio

pricing: Premium positioning at approximately 50-70% of new furniture cost. Volume discounts available for 100+ room projects (15-20% off standard pricing). Framework agreement pricing negotiable. Refurbishment adds 20-30% margin to base sourcing cost.
projectExamples: Nobis Hotels - luxury hospitality furniture refurbishment
Wihlborgs - multiple premium property fit-outs with sustainability focus
Kammarkollegiet framework projects - government and institutional buildings
E.ON collaboration via Input partnership - 195 tonnes CO2 saved
Major corporate office fit-outs (100+ workstations)
Restaurant and café furniture projects across Sweden

name: INPUT INTERIÖR / GREENIFIED
description: Sweden's largest interior solutions provider with 1,000+ employees and 41 showrooms nationwide. Operates Greenified circular marketplace platform integrating new and reused furniture. Enterprise-scale infrastructure with professional project management and comprehensive sustainability documentation.
location: 41 showrooms across Sweden with prominent Stockholm headquarters. Pan-Nordic presence including Finland, Denmark, and Norway. Primary refurbishment operations in Dalby (shared with YLLW partnership). Jönköping warehouse facility.
services: Furniture rental options for corporate clients
Custom sourcing for specific design requirements
Volume discount programs for enterprise clients

capabilities.volume: Enterprise scale: entire corporate headquarters fit-outs documented (E.ON example). 1,000+ employee infrastructure enables simultaneous large projects. Access to both YLLW inventory (Dalby) and own Input Stockholm stock.
capabilities.leadTime: Greenified stock items: 1-3 weeks. Custom sourcing projects: 6-12 weeks. Refurbishment services: add 3-6 weeks. Enterprise PM structure enables complex phased delivery schedules.
capabilities.inventory: Hybrid model: large refurbished inventory plus new furniture integration. Access to premium brands (Vitra, Fritz Hansen) in inventory. Dalby refurbishment factory shared capacity with YLLW. Stockholm HQ showroom for rapid metro access.
capabilities.logistics: Confirmed Nordic coverage (Sweden, Finland, Denmark, Norway). 41 showrooms provide distributed delivery capability. Professional logistics network for cross-border projects. Stockholm-Helsinki route proven.

contact.name: Key Account Manager (contact via main channels)

certifications: Full sustainability reporting (195 tonnes CO2e quantified in E.ON case)
Professional documentation systems for enterprise clients
EU-wide environmental product declarations (EPDs)
EN standard fire testing capability (arrange via partners)
Green building certification project experience

hospitalityReadiness.score: High potential - Strong enterprise capability but unproven hospitality track record

name: REKOMO AB
description: Established B2B office furniture reuse specialist (approximately 30 years operating history) with emphasis on fast delivery and competitive pricing. Three major showrooms covering Sweden's primary metropolitan areas with large warehouse facilities at each location.
location: Major showrooms and warehouses in Stockholm, Gothenburg (Göteborg), and Malmö covering Sweden's three largest metropolitan areas. Additional presence in multiple Swedish cities providing regional coverage.
services: Buy and resell used office furniture

capabilities.inventory: Large ready stock across three major showrooms. Focus on office furniture (chairs, desks, storage). Generic commercial aesthetics rather than curated design pieces. High inventory turnover model.
capabilities.logistics: Confirmed Nordic coverage (serves entire Nordics per website claims). Stockholm-Göteborg-Malmö triangle provides major metro coverage. Regional delivery network for secondary Swedish cities.

name: KOMPANJONEN
description: Specialized circular construction consultant and reuse facilitator, subsidiary of Dacke Consulting. Expert in regulatory compliance navigation, Building Material Bank (BVB) alternative pathways, and complex sourcing coordination. Operates as strategic partner rather than stock-based supplier.
location: Stockholm-based consulting office. Not a warehouse operation but coordinates sourcing from regional suppliers and salvage networks across Sweden.
services: Fire safety testing coordination with RISE/SP labs
Regulatory navigation for Swedish building codes
Specialty item sourcing (lighting, building materials, unique pieces)

capabilities.volume: Not a volume supplier - sources on-demand for specific projects. Can coordinate large building renovation scales (entire hotel interior documented). Strength is sourcing difficult-to-find items, not bulk furniture.
capabilities.leadTime: Sourcing projects: 4-16 weeks variable depending on specificity and market availability. Complex or rare items: longer lead times. Custom sourcing nature means unpredictable timelines.
capabilities.inventory: No warehouse inventory - consultant model coordinates third-party suppliers. Network includes Återbruksfabriken, Brattöns, vintage dealers, demolition contractors across Sweden.
capabilities.logistics: Coordinates logistics but doesn't provide delivery services. Cross-border (Sweden-Finland) possible via coordination but not standard offering. Client or general contractor typically handles final delivery.

name: ÅTERBRUKSFABRIKEN
description: Building materials salvage and reuse specialist operating Sweden's largest dedicated circular construction warehouse. Focus on architectural elements, interior construction systems, and building materials rather than furniture. Södertälje location provides Stockholm region access.
location: Vrena, Södertälje/Sörmland region approximately 50km from Stockholm. 5,000 square meter dedicated warehouse facility for building materials and interior construction components.
services: Salvaged building materials sales (doors, windows, flooring)
Interior construction systems (drywall, partitions, ceiling systems)
Wood, glass, and stone reclaimed materials

capabilities.volume: 5,000 m² warehouse enables large commercial building renovation scale. Can supply materials for entire hotel interior build-outs (structural and finish materials). Not suitable for furniture volume (limited furniture inventory).
capabilities.leadTime: Stock items: 2-4 weeks from warehouse. Custom sourcing: 6-12 weeks (demolition-dependent timing). Building materials lead times longer than furniture due to project-specific sourcing.
capabilities.inventory: Extensive building materials: doors, windows, flooring, ceiling systems, glass partitions, drywall, millwork materials. Minimal furniture focus. Inventory depends on current demolition projects. Södertälje proximity to Stockholm provides metro access.
capabilities.logistics: Regional delivery within Stockholm area (50km radius). Heavy building materials (weight/volume) make cross-border shipping cost-prohibitive. Best for local/regional Swedish projects, not Finland exports.

certifications: Green building certification project experience
Works with LEED, BREEAM, Miljöbyggnad projects
Building material safety standards
Quality assessment protocols for salvaged materials

name: PLACE2PLACE
description: Online marketplace platform aggregating third-party sellers of vintage and designer furniture. Does not own inventory but facilitates transactions between individual sellers and buyers. Specializes in unique, one-of-a-kind pieces rather than volume commercial furniture.
location: Online platform without physical warehouses. Likely Stockholm-based team manages platform operations. Sellers located throughout Sweden with items requiring individual negotiation for delivery.

Individual item listings from multiple third-party sellers

capabilities.inventory: Aggregates third-party seller inventory (no owned stock). Vintage designer pieces, mid-century modern, architectural antiques. High-end aesthetic but unpredictable availability. Cannot guarantee specific items or quantities.
capabilities.logistics: Delivery depends on individual seller agreements. Some sellers offer delivery, others require buyer pickup. Cross-border (Sweden-Finland) possible if individual sellers agree but not standard platform service.

name: BRATTÖNS ÅTERBRUK
description: Göteborg regional architectural salvage yard specializing in unique statement pieces and reclaimed building materials. Salvage yard business model focuses on one-of-a-kind items rather than volume commercial furniture supply.
location: Göteborg (Gothenburg) region, Western Sweden. Salvage yard facility with regional Göteborg market focus. Distance from Stockholm (approximately 470km) limits nationwide projects.
services: Salvaged wood, metal, and stone materials

capabilities.volume: Salvage yard model unsuitable for volume orders. Cannot supply 50+ matching chairs or uniform hotel furniture. Best for 1-10 unique statement pieces per project.
capabilities.leadTime: Items sold as-is from salvage yard inventory. Immediate availability for in-stock items but unpredictable sourcing for specific requests. Restoration time adds weeks if client arranges separately.
capabilities.inventory: Salvage yard inventory constantly changing based on demolitions. Architectural elements, vintage furniture, statement pieces, reclaimed materials. Göteborg regional focus limits Stockholm metro access.
capabilities.logistics: Regional Göteborg delivery. Customer pickup common for salvage yards. Stockholm delivery (470km) adds significant cost and complexity. Cross-border shipping unlikely for heavy architectural elements.
